attributes.action: Replace Goverment with a website and allow laws to be made and passed by internet voting, this way the Democratic majority will really rule the country and no have to pander to minority rule or Brussels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we need an elected Government in the 21st century. It costs us money and lies to us. Surely a computer based website that all could access would be a fairer unbiased democratic way to manage this country. We would never have Laws that the majority didnt want or be lied to by Politicians  some of whom appear to have their own personal agendas and dont vote for what their constituents want. No need for spin anymore.
